creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
It seems that the move(...) method of DocumentManagerImpl copies and deletes the
resources twice.
move() calls copy() and then delete(), and the latter two methods already
copy/delete the resources, so move() does not need to care about the resources.

creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
Created attachment 15786
patch for DocumentManagerImpl

This patch removes the unnecessary code.
Note that I could not really test this patch because of bug 
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35875

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I applied the patch, thanks a lot.
